name: Spellcaster Duel
description:
In Spellcaster Duel, you are in a frenzy duel against an enemy. Cast spells by matching symboles !


The theme:

There are two opponents fighting each other, you and your enemy !

The team:
  • Hernz: programming (@LoukaSoret)
  • PatteDeCanaard: programming, art (@PatteDeCanaard
Tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.2
  • 2D tools: Krita, Gimp

Every asset (except the music) has been made by us, most of them during the jam. We tried to use the most open-source tools as possible.

Musics and sounds used:

Memoraphile - Spooky Dungeon
